issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 19; however, the containing class null is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 20; however, the containing class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
